Get Creative with Robert Kaufman Pokemon Sparkle & Friends on Navy Cotton Fabric

Unleash your inner artist with this fun and playful fabric featuring your favorite Pokemon characters. The navy background adds a touch of sophistication to the design, making it perfect for a variety of projects. Whether you're creating a quilt, crafting a unique accessory, or making pillowcases for your little ones, this fabric is sure to add a touch of magic to your creations.

Product Details

  • Width: 44 inches

  • Care: Machine Wash Gentle Cold, Nonchlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Warm Iron

data.name: Hello Kitty & Friends on Pink Cotton Fabric
data.description:
Get comfy with Hello Kitty and Friends on Pink Cotton Fabric

Looking for a fabric that combines cuteness and durability? Look no further than this Hello Kitty and Friends on Pink Cotton Fabric! Made from 100% cotton, this fabric is not only soft and comfortable but also easy to care for, making it perfect for a wide range of sewing projects.

The playful print features Hello Kitty and her friends in various poses on a pink background, adding a touch of whimsy to any project. Whether you're creating fun and colorful quilts, accessories, or home decor items, this fabric is sure to make your project stand out.

Product Details

  • Width: 44 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine Wash Gentle Cold, Nonchlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Warm Iron
  • Imported
  • Best Used For: Quilts, Crafts, Pillowcases, Pet Accessories
